snippet: The owner of three Manhattan kosher restaurants is opening a market on the Upper East Side with a butcher shop and bakery.
abstract: The owner of three Manhattan kosher restaurants is opening a market on the Upper East Side with a butcher shop and bakery.
lead_paragraph: A bountiful array of glatt kosher prepared foods, traditional and innovative, is the star attraction at Prime Butcher Baker, an elaborate new market created by Joey Allaham, who owns the Manhattan kosher restaurants Prime Grill, Prime KO and Solo. But there is also plenty for those who prefer to do the cooking.

headline.main: Prime Butcher Baker, a New Kosher Market
